message: Let's split fairly, more for me since I made the first offer
Your turn! I'll be fairer than you were, but I still need a good deal.
Come on, let's meet in the middle, I'm being generous despite the inflation
This is my last offer above 50%, the inflation is hitting you harder - take the deal!
I'd rather take a chance, your 'generous' offers aren't good enough
The clock is ticking and inflation is eating your share. I'm barely budging, take it or leave it!
